metadata.title: CVE-2020-22352 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The gf_dash_segmenter_probe_input function in GPAC v0.8 allows attackers tocause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) via a crafted file inthe MP4Box command.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
